mapper.insert: INSERT INTO perform_agreement( perform_agreement_id, complaint_main_id, agreement_pay_amount, hospital_pay_amount, hospital_pay_time, insurance_pay_amount, insurance_pay_time, next_link, next_link_man, create_by, create_date, update_date, del_flag, compensate_time, claim_settlement_time ) VALUES ( #{performAgreementId}, #{complaintMainId}, #{agreementPayAmount}, #{hospitalPayAmount}, #{hospitalPayTime}, #{insurancePayAmount}, #{insurancePayTime}, #{nextLink}, #{nextLinkMan}, #{createUser}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, 0, #{compensateTime}, #{claimSettlementTime} )
